name: The Descent (itch) (Piffle)
description:
The Descent is a  game in which the goal is to get as far down as you can go. Jumping from platform to platform and avoiding enemies. As you stand on a platform it will shrink so don't stay in one place to long. Falling to the edge of the screen or touching an enemy is fatal.

Move left or right using A & D or your arrow keys

Use your mouse to aim and shoot at enemies (Playing with mouse is recommended) 

Playing in fullscreen will give a more enjoyable experience
